alert.note: Alert for Bear River Range (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Avalanche Warning issued December 31 at 6:24AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...The Forest Service Utah Avalanche Center in Salt Lake City has ISSUED an AVALANCHE WARNING which is in effect until 6 AM MST Monday... * WHAT...Avalanche warning. The avalanche danger is expected to be HIGH. * WHERE...For the mountains of northern and central Utah, to include southeast Idaho. This includes the Wasatch Range, the Bear River Range, the Western Uintas, and the Manti-Skyline Plateau.. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Very dangerous avalanche conditions exist. With heavy snowfall and strong winds, both human-triggered and natural avalanches are likely. Stay off of and out from under slopes steeper than 30 degrees. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Consult www.utahavalanchecenter.org or www.avalanche.org for more detailed information. Similar avalanche danger may exist at locations outside the coverage area of this or any avalanche center.
